title: Do you still gain and lose LP in ranked during this server maintinence?
body: Please somebody answer who already knows, don't feel pressured to go into ranked to test it.

replies.body: Yes. It was just a display issue that should be resolved by now. Go ahead and restart your client and let me know if you're able to see your ranked info now.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wdi0wyG3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-08T22:22:26.711+0000)
>
> Yes. It was just a display issue that should be resolved by now. Go ahead and restart your client and let me know if you're able to see your ranked info now.

Sorry I was playing games, Issue is resolved on my end :P
